Title: MORBIUS Vignette (Telugu) - The Lore of Morbius
Desc:
From a forbidden Marvel character to a new Marvel legend. Watch 'The Lore of Morbius' in Telugu here. 
FINAL TRAILER Monday. #MORBIUS is exclusively in cinemas April 1. Releasing in English, Hindi, Tamil and Telugu.

Follow MORBIUS on Social: 
https://www.facebook.com/morbiusmovie  
https://twitter.com/morbiusmovie 
https://www.instagram.com/morbiusmovie 
https://www.discord.gg/Morbius

One of the most compelling and conflicted characters in Sony Pictures Universe of Marvel Characters comes to the big screen as Oscar®️ winner Jared Leto transforms into the enigmatic antihero Michael Morbius. Dangerously ill with a rare blood disorder and determined to save others suffering his same fate, Dr. Morbius attempts a desperate gamble. While at first it seems to be a radical success, a darkness inside him is unleashed. Will good override evil – or will Morbius succumb to his mysterious new urges?

Directed by: Daniel Espinosa
 
Screen Story and Screenplay by: Matt Sazama & Burk Sharpless
 
Based on the Marvel Comics
 
Produced by:
Avi Arad
Matt Tolmach
Lucas Foster

Cast:
Jared Leto
Matt Smith
Adria Arjona
Jared Harris
Al Madrigal
with Tyrese Gibson

#JaredLeto #Morbius #SonyPictures #Sony #MattSmith #AdriaArjona #JaredHarris #AlMadrigal #TyreseGibson #MichaelMorbius #Marvel #MarvelComics

Presenting to you the grand and glorious music video of #Gandhari composed by #PawanCH starring the stunning #KeerthySuresh in the direction and choreography of the phenomenal #BrindaMaster.  Yes you read all those names right. Enjoy this feast as many times as you can and give it all your love!

Title: Takku Mukku Tikku Thalam - Title Track Lyric | Dharan Kumar | Thankar Bachan | Vijith Bachan | Deva
Desc:
Tamil Lyrics 
பல்லவி : 
டக்கு, முக்கு, டிக்கு-டிக்கு
டக்கு, முக்கு, டிக்குத்தாளம்

ஏய் டக்கு, முக்கு, டிக்கு தாளம்
போடப்போறன்டா!
நம்ம பொண்ணுங்கள ஜிகுஜிகுன்னு 
மாத்தப்போறன்டா!

கொஞ்சம் பவுடரத்தான் போட்டு
பளபளப்ப சேத்து!
எம்புஜ்ஜிப்பொண்ணு வந்துப்புட்டா
சுருசுருப்ப ஏத்து!

- டக்கு, முக்கு, டிக்கு தாளம் 
போடப்போறேன்டா!
நம்ம பொண்ணுங்கள ஜிகுஜிகுன்னு 
மாத்தப்போறேன்டா!

அனுபல்லவி : 
சில்லாக்கி பில்லாக்கி சீனாக்குட்டியே
இந்த மாமாவ வாட்டாதடி சிலோன் ரொட்டியே!
புரோட்டாக்கு சால்னாவ போட்டா சூப்பரு
என்னக் கட்டிப்புடிச்சி கடிச்சிடேன்டி என் ஜிகுஜிகுச்சான்!

சரணம் : 
ஏ வெள்ள வவ்வா இடுப்பு துடுப்புப்போடுது
கவ்வச்சொல்லி வெறிய ஏத்திப்பாக்குது
வெள்ள வவ்வா இடுப்பு துடுப்புப்போடுது
கவ்வச்சொல்லி வெறிய ஏத்திப்பாக்குது

இப்போ கிஸ்சொன்னு தள்ளு,
வடியுது ஜொள்ளு
என்னக் காயவச்சிப் பாக்காதடி
எகிறிடும் பில்லு

இப்போ கிஸ்சொன்னு தள்ளு,
வடியுது ஜொள்ளு
என்னக் காயவச்சிப் பாக்காதடி
எகிறிடும் பில்லு

இப்போ கிஸ்சொன்னு தள்ளு,
வடியுது ஜொள்ளு
என்னக் காயவச்சிப் பாக்காதடி
எகிறிடும் பில்லு

ஏய் நண்பனுங்க ஒண்ணா இருந்தா போதுண்டா 
சொத்து சொகம் வேற எதுக்கு வேணுண்டா 
நீ போவ சொல்ல என்னாத்த எடுத்து போவடா
நாட்ட ஆண்டாலுமே பிரண்ட்ஷிப் இல்லாட்டி வேஸ்ட்டுடா
இதப்புரிஞ்சிட்டா மவுசு திருப்பி வராது வயசு   
துட்டு கெடச்சுதுன்னா ஏதுன்னு மட்டும் கேக்காத பெருசு  
இதப்புரிஞ்சிட்டா மவுசு திருப்பி வராது வயசு   
துட்டு கெடச்சுதுன்னா ஏதுன்னு மட்டும் கேக்காத பெருசு 

டக்கு டக்கு 
டக்கு, முக்கு, டிக்குத்தாளம் போடப்போறேன்டா!
நம்ம நம்ம பொண்ணுங்கள ஜிகுஜிகுன்னு மாத்தப்போறேன்டா!

கொஞ்சம் பவுடரத்தான் போட்டு
பளபளப்ப சேத்து!
எம்புஜ்ஜிப்பொண்ணு வந்துப்புட்டா
சுருசுருப்ப ஏத்து!
 
சில்லாக்கி பில்லாக்கி சீனாக்குட்டியே
இந்த மாமாவ வாட்டாதடி சிலோன் ரொட்டியே!
புரோட்டாக்கு சால்னாவ போட்டா சூப்பரு
என்னக் கட்டிப்புடிச்சி கடிச்சிடேன்டி என் ஜிகுஜிகுச்சான்!

Title: UNCHARTED - Final Trailer (Tamil) | Tom Holland, Mark Wahlberg, Antonio Banderas
Desc:
In a race for $5 billion, be careful who you trust. 
Tom Holland and Mark Wahlberg star in #UnchartedMovie, exclusively in cinemas February 18. Releasing in English, Hindi, Tamil and Telugu.

Based on one of the best-selling, most critically acclaimed video game series of all time, Uncharted introduces audiences to the young street-smart Nathan Drake (Tom Holland) and showcases his first treasure hunting adventure with wisecracking partner Victor “Sully” Sullivan (Mark Wahlberg). In an action-adventure epic that spans the globe, the two go in dangerous pursuit of “the greatest treasure never found” while also tracking clues that may lead to Nathan’s long-lost brother.

Directed by:
Ruben Fleischer
 
Screenplay by:
Rafe Judkins and Art Marcum & Matt Holloway
 
Screen Story by:
Rafe Judkins
 
Based on the PlayStation video game by Naughty Dog
 
Produced by:
Charles Roven
Avi Arad
Alex Gartner
Ari Arad
 
Executive Producers:
Ruben Fleischer
Robert J. Dohrmann
David Bernad
Tom Holland
Asad Qizilbash
Carter Swan
Neil Druckmann
Evan Wells
Art Marcum
Matt Holloway

and Antonio Banderas

Desc:
In a race for $5 billion, be careful who you trust. 
Tom Holland and Mark Wahlberg star in #UnchartedMovie, exclusively in cinemas February 18. Releasing in English, Hindi, Tamil and Telugu.

Based on one of the best-selling, most critically acclaimed video game series of all time, Uncharted introduces audiences to the young street-smart Nathan Drake (Tom Holland) and showcases his first treasure hunting adventure with wisecracking partner Victor “Sully” Sullivan (Mark Wahlberg). In an action-adventure epic that spans the globe, the two go in dangerous pursuit of “the greatest treasure never found” while also tracking clues that may lead to Nathan’s long-lost brother.

Directed by:
Ruben Fleischer
 
Screenplay by:
Rafe Judkins and Art Marcum & Matt Holloway
 
Screen Story by:
Rafe Judkins
 
Based on the PlayStation video game by Naughty Dog
 
Produced by:
Charles Roven
Avi Arad
Alex Gartner
Ari Arad
 
Executive Producers:
Ruben Fleischer
Robert J. Dohrmann
David Bernad
Tom Holland
Asad Qizilbash
Carter Swan
Neil Druckmann
Evan Wells
Art Marcum
Matt Holloway
 
Cast:
Tom Holland
Mark Wahlberg
Sophia Ali
Tati Gabrielle
and Antonio Banderas

Title: Veezhaadhae | Mudhal Nee Mudivum Nee | Darbuka Siva | Abhay Jodhpurkar | Keerthi | Super Talkies
Desc:
Composer's Note:
We all talk a lot to our hearts on a daily basis. A lot more when we find ourselves in times of trouble (Thanks to Sir McCartney). 'Veezhaadhae' is a mind to heart conversation in the form of a song, with some heartfelt poetry. This song is an ode to all the wonderful hearts that keep this world going round.
-Darbuka Siva

Title: UNCHARTED - Official Telugu Trailer 2 (HD) | In Cinemas Feb 18
Desc:
The race for the greatest treasure is on… if they can survive each other first. Watch the Telugu trailer for #UnchartedMovie, exclusively in movie theaters February 18. English, Hindi, Tamil &Telugu

https://bookmy.show/UnchartedMovieVou...
https://m.paytm.me/uncharteddeal

https://www.instagram.com/UnchartedMovie
https://www.twitter.com/UnchartedMovie

Subscribe to the Sony Pictures YouTube Channel for more exclusive content:
http://bit.ly/SonyPicsSubscribe

Street-smart thief Nathan Drake (Tom Holland) is recruited by seasoned treasure hunter Victor “Sully” Sullivan (Mark Wahlberg) to recover a fortune lost by Ferdinand Magellan 500 years ago. What starts as a heist job for the duo becomes a globe-trotting, white-knuckle race to reach the prize before the ruthless Moncada (Antonio Banderas), who believes he and his family are the rightful heirs. If Nate and Sully can decipher the clues and solve one of the world’s oldest mysteries, they stand to find $5 billion in treasure and perhaps even Nate’s long-lost brother...but only if they can learn to work together.

https://www.unchartedmovie.com

Subscribe to the Sony Pictures YouTube Channel for more exclusive content: 
http://bit.ly/SonyPicsSubscribe

Street-smart thief Nathan Drake (Tom Holland) is recruited by seasoned treasure hunter Victor “Sully” Sullivan (Mark Wahlberg) to recover a fortune lost by Ferdinand Magellan 500 years ago. What starts as a heist job for the duo becomes a globe-trotting, white-knuckle race to reach the prize before the ruthless Moncada (Antonio Banderas), who believes he and his family are the rightful heirs. If Nate and Sully can decipher the clues and solve one of the world’s oldest mysteries, they stand to find $5 billion in treasure and perhaps even Nate’s long-lost brother...but only if they can learn to work together.

Title: BRAHMĀSTRA Part One: Shiva (Tamil) | Official Motion Poster | Ayan Mukerji | In Cinemas 09.09.2022
Desc:
BRAHMĀSTRA- the Trilogy, is a 3-part film franchise and the beginning of India’s first original universe – the Astraverse. It is a new original cinematic universe inspired by deeply rooted concepts and tales in Indian mythology but set in the modern world, with epic storytelling of fantasy, adventure, good vs evil, love and hope; all told using cutting edge technology and never-seen-before visual spectacles.

Produced by Fox Star Studios, Dharma Productions, Prime Focus and Starlight Pictures
Music by Pritam
Music on Sony Music India

Releasing in cinemas on 09.09.2022 in 5 Indian languages – Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam and Kannada

Directed by Ayan Mukerji 

Starring Amitabh Bachchan, Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, Mouni Roy and Nagarjuna Akkineni

Title: Po Nee Po Lofi Flip | 3 | Anirudh Ravichander | Dhanush, Shruti Haasan
Desc:
#AnirudhRavichader's iconic heartbreak hit gets a LoFi makeover by #NakulAbhyankar and we can't wait for you to hear it and give it all the love it needs! Watch this space for more LoFi tracks.


What Is LoFi ? 

Lo-fi ( low-fi) is short for low fidelity music. It is a music or production quality in which elements usually regarded as imperfections of a recording or performance are audible, are deliberately used as aesthetic choice. Some of these sounds are Vinyl Crackles, Pitch bending etc. These songs are very good for focus playlists or Study playlists.

Title: Uncharted Official Telugu Trailer | In Cinemas February 18
Desc:
Fortune favors the bold. Watch the official trailer for #UnchartedMovie, starring Tom Holland and Mark Wahlberg, exclusively in movie theaters February 18, 2022. Releasing in English, Hindi, Tamil & Telugu

 

Visit our site:

https://www.unchartedmovie.com

 

Follow Us on Social:

https://www.facebook.com/UnchartedMovie

https://www.instagram.com/UnchartedMovie

https://www.twitter.com/UnchartedMovie

 

Subscribe to the Sony Pictures YouTube Channel for more exclusive content:

http://bit.ly/SonyPicsSubscribe

 

Based on one of the best-selling, most critically acclaimed video game series of all time, Uncharted introduces audiences to the young street-smart Nathan Drake (Tom Holland) and showcases his first treasure hunting adventure with wisecracking partner Victor “Sully” Sullivan (Mark Wahlberg). In an action-adventure epic that spans the globe, the two go in dangerous pursuit of “the greatest treasure never found” while also tracking clues that may lead to Nathan’s long-lost brother.

 

Directed by:

Ruben Fleischer

Screenplay by:

Rafe Judkins and Art Marcum & Matt Holloway

Screen Story by:

Rafe Judkins

Based on the PlayStation video game by Naughty Dog

Produced by:

Charles Roven

Avi Arad

Alex Gartner

Ari Arad

Executive Producers:

Ruben Fleischer

Robert J. Dohrmann

David Bernad

Tom Holland

Asad Qizilbash

Carter Swan

Neil Druckmann

Evan Wells

Art Marcum

Matt Holloway

Cast:

Tom Holland

Mark Wahlberg

Sophia Ali

Tati Gabrielle

and Antonio Banderas

 

#OfficialTrailer #Sony #Trailer #SonyPictures #Uncharted #TomHolland #MarkWahlberg #SophiaAli #TatiGabrielle #AntonioBanderas #RubenFleischer #PlayStation #NaughtyDog

Title: Nuvvunte Naa Jathagaa LoFi Flip | Vikram, Amy Jackson | @A. R. Rahman
Desc:
Presenting to you our new LoFi track #NuvvunteNeeLoFiFlip composed by the legendary #ARRahman. Add this to your work playlists right away if you vibe with this mix. More LoFis on the way so keep watching this space! 

Stream now - https://SMI.lnk.to/NuvvunteNaaJathagaa-LofiFlip 

What Is LoFi ? 
Lo-fi ( low-fi) is short for low fidelity music. It is a music or production quality in which elements usually regarded as imperfections of a recording or performance are audible, are deliberately used as aesthetic choice. Some of these sounds are Vinyl Crackles, Pitch bending etc. These songs are very good for focus playlists or Study playlists. 

Song Name - Nuvvunte Naa Jathagaa

Title: Nenjukkul Peidhidum LoFi Flip | Harris Jayaraj | Nakul Abhyankar
Desc:
We are thrilled to present to you #NenjukkulPeidhidumLoFi, our first ever #TamilLoFi track to all you incredible fans of the album out there! Its time to hit play and let your favourite song play and experience the magic of LoFi while you go about your day! Watch this space for some more exciting LoFi Flips of some of your favourite tracks coming your way in the coming days! 

What Is LoFi ? 

Lo-fi ( low-fi) is short for low fidelity music. It is a music or production quality in which elements usually regarded as imperfections of a recording or performance are audible, are deliberately used as aesthetic choice. Some of these sounds are Vinyl Crackles, Pitch bending etc. These songs are very good for focus playlists or Study playlists. 

Stream now - https://SMI.lnk.to/NenjukkulPeidhidum-LofiFlip

Title: 99 Songs - Sofia Video (Tamil) | A.R. Rahman | Ehan Bhat | Edilsy Vargas | Lisa Ray
Desc:
A.R. Rahman and Jio Studios present 99 Songs, a musical romance. 99 Songs is produced by Rahman’s production company YM Movies and co-produced by Ideal Entertainment. A film of many firsts, 99 Songs witnesses global music legend Rahman's debut as a producer and co-writer. 99 Songs is the Oscar and Grammy Award-winning composer's most ambitious project yet. 

A passionate love story with music at its soul, 99 Songs will release in cinemas on 16th April, 2021. The film will be screened in three languages: Hindi, Tamil and Telugu. 

99 Songs also marks director Vishwesh Krishnamoorthy’s (The Dewarists, Bring on the Night) first foray into cinema. This film also sees Rahman introduce a powerhouse, new talent, actor Ehan Bhat, who makes his debut opposite actor Edilsy Vargas, in this story about a musical quest for love.

Song - Sofia
Singers - Sreekanth Hariharan
Lyrics - Karky

Featuring:
Ehan Bhat, Edilsy Vargas, Tenzin Dalha, Lisa Ray, Manisha Koirala, Rahul Ram and Ranjit Barot
Director: Vishwesh Krishnamoorthy 
Music Director: A.R. Rahman
Story: A R Rahman
Screenplay: Vishwesh Krishnamoorthy
Video Editor - Hashim Zain
A Jio Studios worldwide release
Music Label - Sony Music Entertainment India Pvt. Ltd.

Title: 99 Songs - Sofia Video (Telugu) | A.R. Rahman | Ehan Bhat | Edilsy Vargas | Lisa Ray
Desc:
A.R. Rahman and Jio Studios present 99 Songs, a musical romance. 99 Songs is produced by Rahman’s production company YM Movies and co-produced by Ideal Entertainment. A film of many firsts, 99 Songs witnesses global music legend Rahman's debut as a producer and co-writer. 99 Songs is the Oscar and Grammy Award-winning composer's most ambitious project yet. 

A passionate love story with music at its soul, 99 Songs will release in cinemas on 16th April, 2021. The film will be screened in three languages: Hindi, Tamil and Telugu. 

99 Songs also marks director Vishwesh Krishnamoorthy’s (The Dewarists, Bring on the Night) first foray into cinema. This film also sees Rahman introduce a powerhouse, new talent, actor Ehan Bhat, who makes his debut opposite actor Edilsy Vargas, in this story about a musical quest for love.

Song - Sofia
Singers - Sarthak Kalyani
Lyrics - Rakendu Mouli

Title: Gangubai Kathiawadi | Official Telugu Teaser | Sanjay Leela Bhansali, Alia Bhatt
Desc:
Gangubai Kathiawadi - A story, based on the book “ Mafia Queens of Mumbai” written by S. Hussain Zaidi, is a film that celebrates the rise of a simple girl from Kathiawad who had no choice but to embrace the ways of destiny and swing it in her favour.

The narrative walks through the life of young Ganga who in no time marks her own territory and becomes Gangubai – The Matriarch of Kamathipura.

Once again, Sanjay Leela Bhansali brings to his audience a moving yet stem-winding story with power-packed performances laced in his magical musical notes.
With a promise to make one and all feel inspired in 2021 as Gangubai Kathiawadi celebrates the journey of a girl who became the voice for women empowerment.

Bhansali Productions & PEN Studios Present
A Film by Sanjay Leela Bhansali
Produced by: Sanjay Leela Bhansali & Dr. Jayantilal Gada (Pen Studios)

30th July 2021

In Cinemas: July 30, 2021

Title: 99 Songs - Nee Illa Naanum Video (Tamil) | A.R. Rahman | Ehan Bhat | Edilsy Vargas | Lisa Ray
Desc:
A.R. Rahman and Jio Studios present 99 Songs, a musical romance. 99 Songs is produced by Rahman’s production company YM Movies and co-produced by Ideal Entertainment. A film of many firsts, 99 Songs witnesses global music legend Rahman's debut as a producer and co-writer. 99 Songs is the Oscar and Grammy Award-winning composer's most ambitious project yet. 

A passionate love story with music at its soul, 99 Songs will release in cinemas on 16th April, 2021. The film will be screened in three languages: Hindi, Tamil and Telugu. 

99 Songs also marks director Vishwesh Krishnamoorthy’s (The Dewarists, Bring on the Night) first foray into cinema. This film also sees Rahman introduce a powerhouse, new talent, actor Ehan Bhat, who makes his debut opposite actor Edilsy Vargas, in this story about a musical quest for love.

Singers - Haricharan

Title: Duroflex Sounds of Sleep – Omanathinkal Kidavo | Sanah Moidutty
Desc:
For Episode 3 of Duroflex Sounds of Sleep, we along with Kalki Koechlin and Duroflex have for you the most popular Malayalam lullaby that was composed by the biggest icon of Carnatic music, Irayimman Thampi in 1813 on a special request of the king of Travancore to put his baby boy to sleep. We have the very talented Sanah Moidutty revive it in her soulful voice. #Duroflex #SoundsOfSleep #LullabiesOfIndia

Title: 99 Songs - Jukebox (Tamil) | A.R. Rahman | Ehan Bhat | Edilsy Vargas | Lisa Ray | Manisha Koirala
Desc:
A.R. Rahman and Jio Studios present 99 Songs, a musical romance. 99 Songs is produced by Rahman’s production company YM Movies and co-produced by Ideal Entertainment. A film of many firsts, 99 Songs witnesses global music legend Rahman's debut as a producer and co-writer. 99 Songs is the Oscar and Grammy Award-winning composer's most ambitious project yet. 

A passionate love story with music at its soul, 99 Songs will release in cinemas on 16th April, 2021. The film will be screened in three languages: Hindi, Tamil and Telugu. 

99 Songs also marks director Vishwesh Krishnamoorthy’s (The Dewarists, Bring on the Night) first foray into cinema. This film also sees Rahman introduce a powerhouse, new talent, actor Ehan Bhat, who makes his debut opposite actor Edilsy Vargas, in this story about a musical quest for love.

Title: Neel Koadugaal | Mudhal Nee Mudivum Nee | Darbuka Siva | Bombay Jayashri, Dima El Sayed | Keerthi
Desc:
Composer’s Note:
 
Probably the most inspiring and interesting song I have made so far. It’s nearly impossible for me to put into words about what this song is all about or what it means to me. The only thing I can say is that it deals with my most favourite and intriguing thing in life - time.
 
Presenting Bombay Jayashri representing Time and Dima El Sayed representing Space. These two voices are true forces of nature.
 
Movie - Mudhal Nee Mudivum Nee
Song - Neel Koadugaal - An ode to time

Title: Pudhidhaai | Mudhal Nee Mudivum Nee | Darbuka Siva | Jonita Gandhi | Keerthi | Super Talkies
Desc:
New beginnings and new memories! Presenting the nostalgia-inducing #Pudhidhaai from #DarbukaSiva's #MudhalNeeMudivumNee! Travelling through memory lane, this fun number sung by #JonitaGandhi is sure to make you fall in love with the city a little more! 

Watch the official Tamil song video here!

Composer’s Note:
The sounds of ukulele strums and the reggae groove somehow makes me think of holidays, the beach and the times that were spent joyfully, living every moment to its fullest. This music blends with the sights and sounds of Madras seamlessly, to create a perfect canvas for some unadulterated teenage-like fun and to make some memories for life. After all, this is what songs are for.
-Darbuka Siva

Title: Pakkam Neeyum Illai - Video | Vivek Mervin | Tamil Pop Songs 2021 | Tamil Pop Music VIdeos 2021
Desc:
One of the most exciting love songs of the new decade is here! #VivekMervin are here as promised with their brand new Chill-Step love song #PakkamNeeyumIllai with a stunningly shot stylish music video that also features the composers.  The song is all about exploring the love that exists in between being  in love and separation, and has been  penned beautifully by Ku. Karhtik. You cannot start the year any better, heck this out right away!

Title: Isai Anjali | Tribute to S.P. Balasubrahmanyam | SPB
Desc:
A heart-felt tribute to the irreplaceable phenomenon named S.P.Balasubramanyam. Presenting #IsaiAnjali by Brooke Bond 3 Roses, a brand that strives for togetherness, bringing along music lovers across regions, cultures, languages and countries. It marks the coming together of musicians celebrating the legendary Shri. S.P. Balasubrahmanyam. Join us in this humble re-creation of #Anjali produced by Leon James featuring Srinivas , Anirudh Ravichander, Haricharan and Uthara Unnikrishnan, with words penned by Madhan Karky.
 
To a voice that will forever resonate in our hearts and playlists , music misses you dear SPB.

Title: Kaatrilae - Mudhal Nee Mudivum Nee | Darbuka Siva | Nakul Abhyankar | Kaber Vasuki | Super Talkies
Desc:
A trip down the nostalgic lane! #Kaatrilae from #DarbukaSiva's #MudhalNeeMudivumNee is sure to leave you teary-eyed reminiscing your school days! Click play and enjoy this melody now!

Watch the official Tamil lyric video here!

Composer’s Note:
Growing up in the 90s in the Mtv era, I was very influenced by soft rock music with its signature riffing guitars, groovy drums and bass and the fanfare brass and woodwinds. On a meta level, I feel that these sounds represent the rock ’n roll vibe of these school kids as much as it represents the 90s and its sensibilities. It’s a deliberate throwback sound that throws me back into that era.
 
-Darbuka Siva
 
Movie - Mudhal Nee Mudivum Nee
Song - Kaatrilae 
Singer - Nakul Abhyankar 
Composer - Darbuka Siva 
Lyrics - Kaber Vasuki

Title: Thank You ISAI - Video | Srinivas
Desc:
This music video is a humble attempt to retrace my experiments and journey with music and all creators whom I’m grateful to.

Thanks to music lovers across regions, languages, cultures and countries who’ve received my music with open heart, showering so much love and making this journey possible.

There are soo many I want to thank for my journey over these years. The ones that played huge roles in my journey(many inspirations too)are in the video, and their names are on the hillock at the end, and some I may have inadvertently forgotten. Beyond all that, it is Music that I am truly grateful for..

Thank You Isai✨

Song Name : Thank You Isai 
Composed and written by Srinivas
Sung by Srinivas and Timmy

Title: Mudhal Nee Mudivum Nee  - Title Track Lyric | Darbuka Siva | Sid Sriram | Thamarai | Super Talkies
Desc:
A lilting melody from the famed #DarbukaSiva , #SidSriram and #Thamarai trio! Presenting the loop-worthy #MudhalNeeMudivumNee title track from the composer's directorial debut!

Hit play and enjoy the official Tamil lyric video of #MNMN now!

Stream now - https://SMI.lnk.to/MNMNTitleTrackDC

Composer's Note:

The song Mudhal Nee Mudivum Nee for me is a collage of sounds from various musical soundscapes that relate to nostalgia and the wonderful memories associated with it. 

The Sarod’s classical texture converses with the voice to create that feeling, coupled with strings that form a sonic movement which often plays around with trancy layers of interesting shapes and patterns of sounds.

Darbuka Siva

Title: Lockdown, new normal & beyond #PapaHainNa (Kannada) | Happy #FathersDay
Desc:
The lockdown saw fathers spend maximum time home and take on newer & challenging tasks. From household chores to keeping the kids engaged, you have done it all. This #FathersDay capture those heartfelt moments spent with kids and create memories that will last forever. Whether it be the lockdown or life in the new normal and beyond, #PapaHainNa to protect his kids against all odds. Title: Manam Lestham Nilushtam - Unlock 1.0 | We Will Rise | A film for India | Virtual Bharat | Bharatbala
Desc:
9 weeks. 1.3 billion humans. Locked down. 
A silent nation caught in a time we have never experienced before. 
The world's most populated democracy, is captive before an unseen threat, the novel corona virus. 
This is a time in the history of post-independence India, WE WILL NEVER FORGET. 
 
With "Manam Lestham Nilustham" @BharatbalaGanapathy 's @VirtualBharat commemorates the India lockdown. 
 
Uthenge Hum is India's unbelievable story. A call to every Indian. When the sun rises tomorrow and we have to move forward - We Will Rise. 

Shot on Sony
@virtualbharat @bharatbala @chinmayisripaada

Title: Whispering Hues - Varun Sunil feat Rajhesh Vaidhya| Irena Mihalkovich
Desc:
Are you an alien on this land? 
Tell me, who are you.  
you are the breath of the trees,
you are the colors in the rainbow, 
you are the fragrance of the soil beneath, 
you are the butterfly and the guardian of the night.
you are earth, water and fire. 
Yet you are an alien to me. 
You live in your concrete jungle and call it home.
You torment me to further your own.
You are an alien to your soul. 
Come back to me, 
do you not hear my cries,
do you not hear my whispers in the hues of the black sky,
come back to me.
You are no alien,
You are me and i am you.


Song - Whispering Hues

Title: ibis Music – Staccato – Elay(Live @ IBIS Chennai)
Desc:
Sony Music and ibis have collaborated for ‘ibis Music’, a live music property that brings audiences, established musicians and upcoming artists together in select ibis hotels in India. ibis Music aims to connect with travelers and local residents using music. 

Band: Staccato 
Song Name : Elay

Chennai based band - Staccato is known to take inspiration from various forms of music and fuse them with newer arrangements to form their own music. 

Drawing from its many influences from across genres and the world, Staccato is as much a celebration of Chennai as of world music.

Title: The Angry Birds Movie 2 - Official Telugu Trailer | In Cinemas August 23
Desc:
The flightless angry birds and the scheming green piggies take their beef to the next level in The Angry Birds Movie 2!  When a new threat emerges that puts both Bird and Pig Island in danger, Red (Jason Sudeikis), Chuck (Josh Gad), Bomb (Danny McBride), and Mighty Eagle (Peter Dinklage) recruit Chuck’s sister Silver (Rachel Bloom) and team up with pigs Leonard (Bill Hader), his assistant Courtney (Awkwafina), and techpig Garry (Sterling K. Brown) to forge an unsteady truce and form an unlikely superteam to save their homes.

Title: Spider-Man Far From Home - Official Tamil Trailer | July 5 - 2019
Desc:
Peter Parker returns in Spider-Man™: Far From Home, the next chapter of the Spider-Man™: Homecoming series! Our friendly neighbourhood Super Hero decides to join his best friends Ned, MJ, and the rest of the gang on a European vacation. However, Peter’s plan to leave super heroics behind for a few weeks are quickly scrapped when he begrudgingly agrees to help Nick Fury uncover the mystery of several elemental creature attacks, creating havoc across the continent!

Title: Spider-Man Far From Home - Official Telugu Teaser Trailer | July 5 - 2019
Desc:
Peter Parker returns in Spider-Man™: Far From Home, the next chapter of the Spider-Man™: Homecoming series! Our friendly neighbourhood Super Hero decides to join his best friends Ned, MJ, and the rest of the gang on a European vacation. However, Peter’s plan to leave super heroics behind for a few weeks are quickly scrapped when he begrudgingly agrees to help Nick Fury uncover the mystery of several elemental creature attacks, creating havoc across the continent!

Screenplay by: Chris McKenna & Erik Sommers

Title: Imaginarium - It’s a Wonderful World Tour | India’s First Live Art Show
Desc:
Sony Music India and BookMyShow collaborate to introduce India’s first live art show for kids and families called Imaginarium.  A made in India concept for kids where they’re invited to discover, explore and expand their imagination through a host of live on-stage experiences, conducted by India’s premiere and only real-life Kids Influencer – Rob. As India’s First Interactive Show for Kids and Families, Imaginarium mixes Rob’s real-life experiences with his unique, magical and larger-than-life artistic interpretations, to create a concept that will mesmerize and engage audiences of all ages.
 
Conceptualised and curated by Sony Music and Rob, The limited shows will first be performed in Chennai and Bangalore, before moving to other cities.
 
It’s just a week away so book your tickets now - http://bit.ly/Imaginarium_Rob
Get ready for 2 hours of Art, Music and Magic at SMVR Concert Hall, Chennai on Nov 30th at 6 pm and on Dec 1st & 2nd at 12 pm and 6 pm. And at Good Shepherd Auditorium in Bengaluru on the 14th of Dec at 6 pm and on 15th and 16th Dec at 12 pm and 6 pm.
 
Don’t forget to RSVP on the event page as well –
https://www.facebook.com/events/1025132127667377/
https://www.facebook.com/events/2185589278366620/
 
We are excited to see the #RobArmy at the shows! It’s going to be a roller coaster ride of Creativity for Kids and families!

Music Label - Sony Music Entertainment India Pvt. Ltd.

© 2018 Sony Music Entertainment India Pvt. Ltd.
